advancements.aquamirae.root.descr: ma pi tomo tawa telo moli
advancements.aquamirae.root.title: ante Akamiwe
advancements.aquamirae.find_ice_maze.des: o lon ma 'ma sinpin lete' lon ma 'telo pi supa kiwen'.
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_fin.descr: o kama jo e lipu kala
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_fin.title: sama lipu pi tawa kon
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_anglers_fa: o kama jo e palisa uta kala
advancements.aquamirae.terrible_armor.de: o pali e len ike ale o kepeken ona
o pali e len telo ale o kepeken ona
advancements.aquamirae.abyssal_armor.des: o pali e len ale pi suno telo o kepeken ona
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_shell_horn: o kama jo e ijo suli lon tomo tawa telo lete
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_frozen_key: o kepeken palisa kalama kon lon poka telo. o kama jo e palisa open tan kon pi jan lawa
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_dagger_of_: o kama jo e palisa utala mani
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_rune_of_th: o kama jo e mani sitelen lete
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_esca.descr: o kama jo e suno kala
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_esca.title: suno lon pimeja
o pali e moku telo pi telo suli o moku e ona
advancements.aquamirae.consume_poseidons: o pali e moku pi jan sewi telo, o moku e ona
advancements.aquamirae.catch_golden_moth: o poki e pipi mani lon poki lili
ability.aquamirae.abyssal_armor_full_1: §8len lawa kiwen la §rwawa pi len ale > sina moli la, sina awen lon tenpo {#1}, li moli lon pini tenpo. ni la, wawa utala sina li lili pi mute 80%.
ability.aquamirae.abyssal_armor_full_2: §8len lawa suno la §rwawa pi len ale > ni li pakala e lukin pi ijo lon poka. ni la, wawa tawa ona li kama lili pi mute 50%.
ability.aquamirae.abyssal_armor_half: wawa pi len tu > +25% awen len > +4 awen wawa len
ability.aquamirae.dagger_of_greed_1: kama jo > jan li utala e jan ike anu jan tomo la, ona li pana e kiwen esun.
ability.aquamirae.dagger_of_greed_2: kama ike > jan li utala e jan tomo la, ike kama li kama lon.
ability.aquamirae.dagger_of_greed_3: pali nasa > ni li tan tenpo pini mute. supa pona li ken ala pona e ona.
ability.aquamirae.divider: kipisi > ni li utala e ijo la, ken ona pi pona sijelo li kama lili pi mute 5% lon tenpo {#1}. kipisi luka luka la, ken li ken ala kama lili.
ability.aquamirae.fin_cutter: utala jasima > insa pilin weka li suli e wawa utala sama ni: pilin wan li weka, wawa utala li kama suli pi mute {#1} (mute {#2} li ken).
ability.aquamirae.maze_rose: wawa pali > ni li lon e sike utala pi utala wawa {#1} lon tenpo {#2}.
ability.aquamirae.poisoned_blade: jaki > ni li utala e ijo la, sijelo ona li kama ike lon tenpo {#1}.
ability.aquamirae.poisoned_chakra: wawa pali > ni li lon e sike utala pi utala wawa {#1} lon tenpo {#2}. sike li utala e ijo la, sijelo ona li kama ike lon tenpo kama.
ability.aquamirae.remnants_saber: ante > lon telo la wawa utala li kama suli pi mute {#1}.
ability.aquamirae.terrible_armor_full: wawa pi len ale > ijo li utala e sina la, sijelo ona li kama ike lon tenpo {#1}.
ability.aquamirae.terrible_armor_half: wawa pi len tu > sina pakala lon telo la, wawa tawa telo sina li kama suli pi mute {#1} lon tenpo {#2}.
ability.aquamirae.terrible_sword: oko utala > sina utala e ijo la, ona li moli ala la, sina pakala pi wawa {#1}.
ability.aquamirae.three_bolt_armor_full: wawa pi len ale > ni la, sina lete ale lon telo lete pi ma sinpin lete.
ability.aquamirae.three_bolt_armor_half: wawa pi len tu > len lawa en len sijelo la: lon telo la len li pana e kon.
ability.aquamirae.whisper_of_the_abyss: lupa len > ni li utala e ijo la, awen len ona li kama lili pi mute 10% lon {#1}. lupa luka la, awen li ken ala kama lili.
ability.aquamirae.coral_lance: weka > sina utala e ijo pi ma sinpin lete la, wawa utala sina li suli pi mute {#1}.
lore.aquamirae.frozen_key: li open e poki lon ma sinpin lete.
lore.aquamirae.golden_moth_in_a_jar: mani li ken jo e kon ona, li ken moku ala e kon pi ijo ante...
lore.aquamirae.luminescent_bubble: jan lon poka li tawa wawa lon telo. jan li pana e ni mute lon telo la jan li ken pali e nasin lon telo!
lore.aquamirae.pirate_pouch: {I}o luka e {U} la ni li open. > jan pi tomo tawa telo li weka e ni. nena la, ona li pilin sama kala...
lore.aquamirae.poseidons_breakfast: §9pilin utala pi wawa luka luka (3:00) > §9lili tenpo pi wawa luka (3:00) > > §5moku la > §9+100% wawa wawa > §9+50% lili pi tenpo lape
lore.aquamirae.rune_of_the_storm: {I}o luka e {U} la ni li pali. > ni li kama lon palisa utala lon luka ante sina. ni la, ma lete la, wawa utala ona li kama suli pi mute 33%.
lore.aquamirae.dead_sea_scroll: {I}o luka e {U} la ni li pali. > §dpali pi sona ala
lore.aquamirae.sea_casserole: ona li lukin ala lukin e mi? > §9lili tenpo pi wawa tu (1:30) > §9utala wawa (0:30) > > §5moku la > §9+20% lili pi tenpo lili > §9+3 wawa utala
lore.aquamirae.sea_stew: wawa pi telo suli lon insa moku sina a! > §9pilin utala pi wawa tu wan (2:00) > §9utala wawa (2:00) > > §5moku la > §9+30% wawa wawa > §9+3 wawa utala
lore.aquamirae.shell_horn: {B}§dni li kama e jan lawa Konilija. > jan li ken kepeken ni lon poka telo lon ma sinpin lete.
lore.aquamirae.ship_graveyard_echo: sina kute pona la, sina ken kute e kalama pi tomo tawa telo pakala lon ma sinpin lete...
lore.aquamirae.treasure_pouch: {I}o luka e {U} la ni li open. > tenpo pini la, ni li ijo mani. tenpo ni la, ona li mani ala...
lore.aquamirae.wisteria_niveis: lon ma ike lete la, kasi pona li awen ken lon. ni li ken leko.
